price: ߢߊ߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߌ߲߬ߕߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߞߏߢߌߡߊߟߐ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߴߏ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߘߍ߫؟
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
